name: Presidential Race
description:
This is our team's game we developed at the PTBO Gam Jam 02 / 2017.

Controls: Move with WASD or arrow keys. Shoot with left control. Pause with Escape. Jump with the space bar.

Credits:

Sound Assets: Andrew Vader Schaaf

Character Artwork: Zach Prins

Level Design: Ben Prins

Programming: Randall Romphf
